item.description:
Join us for an EXCITING evening celebrating love, laughter, good food, art, and community. The event is a fundraiser for the “Tao LaBossiere Open Heart Fund."

6:00 pm – 7:00 pm Special love-themed Laughter Yoga class
7:15 pm Delicious potluck dinner begins.
7:45 pm - 8:15 pm Lead with Your Heart Comic Mime Show with master mime performer Robert Rivest
8:15 pm - 9:30 pm Hanging out and meeting other cool people

For the last 15 years, Tao LaBossiere has been the volunteer gallery director for ArtSpace. We are deeply grateful for his support of the local arts community and groups that meet at ArtSpace, including the Laughter Club and CT Health Foodies. Tao is in need of open heart surgery and his insurance will leave him with $45,000+ in medical bills.

$5-$10+ donation requested.

******LAUGHTER YOGA with LAURA LE******

Laugh away worries and judgment. Open your heart and feel the love. 

Laughter Yoga is an incredibly fun, incredibly effective way to release stress and bring more joy into your life. It is the simple yet powerful practice of using laughter as exercise. Recommended by Oprah and Dr. Oz.

No special flexibility required. Learn more at www.ctlaugh.com.

******DELICIOUS POTLUCK DINNER******

This potluck dinner is part of a series of monthly organized by CT Health Foodies, a supportive community for people interested in healthy eating.

Backstage Pizza in West Hartford is donating vegan, gluten-free pizzas. 

Please bring a dish to share. And please be mindful as you prepare your dish, and list the ingredients on a note card at the event. Many people have food restrictions.

This is a zero-waste event. PLEASE BRING YOUR OWN PLATE, UTENSILS, and WATER BOTTLE.

******LEAD with YOUR HEART COMIC MIME SHOW******

Trained in Paris by the world famous Marcel Marceau, Robert Rivest has given over 5,000 presentations in 11 countries in Europe, Africa, and across the U.S. His mission is to bring wellness, laughter, and joy to people around the world!

Check out Robert's videos at www.robertrivest.com.

******ART & FUNDRAISER******

Not- to-be-missed exhibit will feature hundreds of artworks by more than one hundred local artists!

If anyone would prefer to donate directly in lieu of participation, feel free to send a check to: 
TD Bank
c/o Tao LaBossiere Open Heart Fund
203 Trumbull Street
Hartford, CT 06103

Or donate online at: 
http://www.giveforward.com/taolabossiereopenheartfund

******FREE PARKING! ******
In the back of the ArtSpace building. Ignore "Resident Parking Only" signs. Parking is allowed during this event. Enter the building through the back entrance.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter through the back entrance by the murals. Walk down the long corridor. At the end of the corridor, on the right, you will see the room where we will be meeting.
item.name: Open Heart Celebration: Healthy Potluck, Laughter, Mime, and Art!
